newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Great Central gold mines run strong.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Great Central gold mines run strong.

text.p: Strong performances from the Bronzewing and Jundee mines of Western Austalia helped lift net profit at Great Central Mines NL to A$46.13 million in 1995/96 compared to a loss in the previous year, chairman Joseph Gutnick said on Thursday.
"We've got two strong operations in Bronzewing and Jundee, " Gutnick said.

Gutnick said the company was on track to meet its forecast of topping the latest year's output of 362,362 ounces. "Next year we're forecasting 550,000 ounces at A$250 per ounce," he said. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
